## debounce

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/utils/utilities.ts" sourceLine="89" packageName="commandkit" />

Debounces a function.



*Example*

```ts
const debouncedFn = debounce(() => {
  console.log('Debounced function called');
}, 300);

debouncedFn(); // Will only execute after 300ms of inactivity
debouncedFn(); // Will reset the timer
debouncedFn(); // Will reset the timer again
```

```ts title="Signature"
function debounce<R, F extends (...args: any[]) => R>(fn: F, ms: number): F
```

<MemberInfo kind="parameter" type={`F`} />

<MemberInfo kind="parameter" type={`number`} />
